sentences.english: As the national college entrance examination approached, Hu chose to study directing at the Central Academy of Drama in Beijing.

sentences.english: Zhang Han graduated from the Central Academy of Drama undergraduate acting classes.
sentences.chinese: 張翰，畢業於中央戲劇學院表演本科班。
